title: electron
content: The electron is a subatomic particle, symbol e− or β−,whose electric charge is negative one elementary charge

title: proton
content: A proton is a subatomic particle, symbol p or p+, with a positive electric charge of +1e elementary charge and a mass slightly less than that of a neutron

title: neutron
content: The neutron is a subatomic particle, symbol n or n0, with no net electric charge and a mass slightly greater than that of a proton
